They should always look at the rearview mirror and pay attention to the distance to the rear vehicles. For rear vehicles, when the braking light of the front vehicle lights up, they should brake synchronously, slow down, and keep a safe distance to the front vehicle.//ego-car hits a car

14//010423 145 175 190，ego-car does not hit a curb//Ego-car driver fail to estimate the accurate distance when turning//Ego-car drivers should practice turning more, slow down when turning, and keep a safe distance from other vehicles.//ego-car hits a curb
11//010424 75 105 120，ego-car does not hit a car//Ego-car is rear ended by the rear car//Ego-cars should try to avoid changing lanes at will, so as not to affect the normal traffic of the rear vehicles. They should always look at the rearview mirror and pay attention to the distance to the rear vehicles. For rear vehicles, when the braking light of the front vehicle lights up, they should brake synchronously, slow down, and keep a safe distance to the front vehicle.//ego-car hits a car
13//010425 135 165 180，ego-car does not hit large roadblocks//Ego-car is out of control//Ego-cars should not drive too fast in bad weather, such as rainy, snowy, nighttime, or in poor locations, such as mountain areas, curves, etc. At the same time, ego-car drivers should keep calm, control the vehicle well, use fast braking to slow down, and do not step on the brakes.//ego-car hits large roadblocks
16//010426 132 162 177，ego-car does not hit trees//Ego-car is out of control//Ego-cars should not drive too fast in bad weather, such as rainy, snowy, nighttime, or in poor locations, such as mountain areas, curves, etc. At the same time, ego-car drivers should keep calm, control the vehicle well, use fast braking to slow down, and do not step on the brakes.//ego-car hits trees

When driving, vehicles should abide by traffic rules, and give the way for the normal running vehicles. Vehicles that will enter the main road should give way to the vehicles which drive on the main road or leave the main road. Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.//ego-car hits a car

In case of an emergency on the road, the ego-car should stop in the lane and try not to change lanes in an emergency. If the braking distance is not enough, collision avoidance can be taken. Ego-car should turn on the turn signal and observe the rear vehicles, and change lanes quickly.//ego-car hits a curb

11//010508 182 212 227，ego-car does not hit a car//vehicles do not give way to normal driving vehicles when turning or changing lanes//Before turning or changing lanes, vehicles should turn on the turn signal in advance, observe the surrounding vehicles and control the speed. When driving, vehicles should abide by traffic rules, and give the way for the normal running vehicles. Vehicles that will enter the main road should give way to the vehicles which drive on the main road or leave the main road. Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.//ego-car hits a car

Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.//ego-car hits a crossing car
10//010867 120 150 180，ego-car does not hit a crossing car//The ego-car's vision is blocked or blurred, and there is no time to brake//Ego-cars should slow down or honk their horns when they stop at intersections or trunk roads where their vision is blocked to prevent other vehicles or pedestrians from rushing out suddenly.//ego-car hits a crossing car
11//010868 128 158 188，ego-car does not hit a car//Ego-car does not give the way at narrow road//Ego-cars should give way at the obstacle road section, narrow mountain road and other places, park at a place with enough width to meet, let the other party pass first, pay attention to the left and right rear-view mirrors, and try to ensure that their right wheels are on the right side of the road.//ego-car hits a car

Vehicles that will enter the main road should give way to the vehicles which drive on the main road or leave the main road. Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.//ego-car hits a car

11//010073 109 145 163，ego-car does not hit a car//The vehicle in front of ego-car decelerates or stops suddenly//When the ego-car driver encounters a sudden deceleration or stop of the front vehicle, he should quickly decelerate, observe the road conditions, place his foot above the brake pedal, be ready to step on the brake at any time, and leave a sufficient safety distance from the front vehicle.//ego-car hits a car
11//010074 69 139 157，ego-car does not hit a car//vehicles are out of control//Vehicles should not drive too fast in bad weather and severe road types, such as rainy, snowy, nightyime, or in poor locations, and mountain areas and curves. At the same time, vehicle drivers should keep calm, control the vehicle, and slow down with quick braking. Do not step on the brakes.//ego-car hits a car

11//010164 167 199 230，ego-car does not hit a car//Ego-car is rear ended by the rear car//Ego-cars should try to avoid changing lanes at will, so as not to affect the normal traffic of the rear vehicles. They should always look at the rearview mirror and pay attention to the distance to the rear vehicles. For rear vehicles, when the braking light of the front vehicle lights up, they should brake synchronously, slow down, and keep a safe distance to the front vehicle.//ego-car hits a car
11//010165 178 209 240，ego-car does not hit a car//The vehicle evades other vehicles, pedestrians or objects and changes lanes emergently//The safety distance between the vehicle and the front vehicle should be sufficient for emergency braking. In case of an emergency on the road, the vehicles should stop in the lane and try not to change lanes in an emergency. If the braking distance is not enough, collision avoidance can be taken. The vehicles should turn on the turn signal and observe the rear vehicles and change lanes quickly.//ego-car hits a car

14//010352 24 215 230，ego-car does not hit a curb//Ego-car evades other vehicles, pedestrians or objects and changes lanes emergently//The safety distances between the ego-car and the front vehicle should be sufficient for emergency braking. In case of an emergency on the road, the ego-car should stop in the lane and try not to change lanes in an emergency. If the braking distance is not enough, collision avoidance can be taken. Ego-car should turn on the turn signal and observe the rear vehicles, and change lanes quickly.//ego-car hits a curb

When driving, vehicles should abide by traffic rules, and give the way for the normal running vehicles. Vehicles that will enter the main road should give way to the vehicles which drive on the main road or leave the main road. Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.//ego-car hits a car
11//010443 23 180 195，ego-car does not hit a car//The vehicle in front of ego-car decelerates or stops suddenly//When the ego-car driver encounters a sudden deceleration or stop of the front vehicle, he should quickly decelerate, observe the road conditions, place his foot above the brake pedal, be ready to step on the brake at any time, and leave a sufficient safety distance from the front vehicle.//ego-car hits a car

When driving, vehicles should abide by traffic rules, and give the way for the normal running vehicles. Vehicles that will enter the main road should give way to the vehicles which drive on the main road or leave the main road. Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.//ego-car hits a car

11//010716 91 155 173，ego-car does not hit a car//The vehicle in front of ego-car decelerates or stops suddenly//When the ego-car driver encounters a sudden deceleration or stop of the front vehicle, he should quickly decelerate, observe the road conditions, place his foot above the brake pedal, be ready to step on the brake at any time, and leave a sufficient safety distance from the front vehicle.//ego-car hits a car

Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.//ego-car hits a car

Vehicles that will enter the main road should give way to the vehicles which drive on the main road or leave the main road. During driving, the goods must also be observed at any time. 6//011454 49 135 159，ego-car does not hit a motorbike//Motorcycle does not notice the other vehicles when turning or changing lanes//When changing lanes or turning, the motorcycle should observe the coming vehicles carefully, and turn on the turn signal in advance when changing lanes; The driver of the vehicle should increase the following distance, so that the motorcycle has enough time to react when turning or changing lanes.//ego-car hits a motorbike

11//011456 46 255 279，ego-car does not hit a car//Ego-car is rear ended by the rear car//Ego-cars should try to avoid changing lanes at will, so as not to affect the normal traffic of the rear vehicles. They should always look at the rearview mirror and pay attention to the distance to the rear vehicles. For rear vehicles, when the braking light of the front vehicle lights up, they should brake synchronously, slow down, and keep a safe distance to the front vehicle.//ego-car hits a car
14//011457 73 221 245，ego-car does not hit a curb//Ego-car is out of control//Ego-cars should not drive too fast in bad weather, such as rainy, snowy, nighttime, or in poor locations, such as mountain areas, curves, etc. At the same time, ego-car drivers should keep calm, control the vehicle well, use fast braking to slow down, and do not step on the brakes.//ego-car hits a curb

Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.//ego-car hits a car
6//011724 53 114 140，ego-car does not hit a motorbike//Ego-car does not notice the motorcycle when turning//If the ego-cars turn on the turn signal in advance when turning, they should pay attention to observing and controlling the speed, and give way to the straight moving motorcycle.//ego-car hits a motorbike
6//011725 35 74 100，ego-car does not hit a motorbike//Motorcycle is out of control//Motorcycles should not drive over speed, and should slow down when encountering curves to prevent the vehicle from sideslipping. When driving in rainy days, the road surface is wet and slippery, and the friction resistance becomes smaller. Vehicles should control the speed, and the braking operation of them should be as soft as possible to avoid anti lock falling.//ego-car hits a motorbike
13//011726 49 104 130，ego-car does not hit large roadblocks//Ego-car driver is in distracted driving//Ego-car drivers should not answer or make phone calls, eat or smoke while riding, sleep, and drive in fatigue.//ego-car hits large roadblocks
10//011727 37 104 130，ego-car does not hit a crossing car//Ego-car drives too fast and the braking distance is short//Ego-cars should not exceed the speed limit during driving, slow down when passing intersections or crosswalks, especially for areas with many pedestrians.//ego-car hits a crossing car
11//011728 78 154 180，ego-car does not hit a car//vehicles do not notice the coming vehicles when turning or changling lanes//If the vehicles turn on the turn signal in advance when changing lanes or turning, they should pay attention to the speed limit, and give way to the straightly moving vehicles.//ego-car hits a car
11//011729 20 124 150，ego-car does not hit a car//The vehicle in front of ego-car decelerates or stops suddenly//When the ego-car driver encounters a sudden deceleration or stop of the front vehicle, he should quickly decelerate, observe the road conditions, place his foot above the brake pedal, be ready to step on the brake at any time, and leave a sufficient safety distance from the front vehicle.//ego-car hits a car
11//011730 40 81 107，ego-car does not hit a car//Ego-car does not give the way at narrow road//Ego-cars should give way at the obstacle road section, narrow mountain road and other places, park at a place with enough width to meet, let the other party pass first, pay attention to the left and right rear-view mirrors, and try to ensure that their right wheels are on the right side of the road.//ego-car hits a car
14//011731 46 114 140，ego-car does not hit a curb//Ego-car is out of control//Ego-cars should not drive too fast in bad weather, such as rainy, snowy, nighttime, or in poor locations, such as mountain areas, curves, etc. At the same time, ego-car drivers should keep calm, control the vehicle well, use fast braking to slow down, and do not step on the brakes.//ego-car hits a curb

At the same time, vehicle drivers should keep calm, control the vehicle, and slow down with quick braking. Do not step on the brakes.//ego-car hits a car

The truck driver should put his foot on the brake pedal and be ready to step on the brake at any time. A sufficient safety distance should be left from the car in front.//truck hits truck

In case of an emergency on the road, the vehicles should stop in the lane and try not to change lanes in an emergency. If the braking distance is not enough, collision avoidance can be taken. 15//011750 19 142 168，ego-car does not hit small roadblocks road pothholes//Ego-car hits the object falling from the front vehicles //Before driving, ego-car must be carefully checked, and the articles carried on the vehicle must be bundled. During driving, the goods must also be observed at any time. If there is looseness, inclination and other conditions, they should be timely re wrapped and bundled; During driving, the self-propelled vehicle should keep a certain safe distance from other vehicles, especially for the large trucks carrying goods, and should not follow or parallel with them for a long time.//ego-car hits small roadblocks road pothholes
12//011751 37 71 97，ego-car is not overtaken by a car//The vehicle overtakes without giving the way to the normal running vehicle//When overtaking, the vehicle should observe the driving conditions of other lanes, so as not to interfere with the driving of vehicles in other lanes, and do not force overtaking without overtaking conditions.//ego-car is overtaken by a car

11//011753 29 144 170，ego-car does not hit a car//Ego-car is rear ended by the rear car//Ego-cars should try to avoid changing lanes at will, so as not to affect the normal traffic of the rear vehicles. They should always look at the rearview mirror and pay attention to the distance to the rear vehicles. For rear vehicles, when the braking light of the front vehicle lights up, they should brake synchronously, slow down, and keep a safe distance to the front vehicle.//ego-car hits a car
